name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart Trip Pin for Google Calendar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Google apps to find lodging, driving directions, car, air and curated content nearby your location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗮 𝘀𝗺𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝘄𝗮𝘆 𝘁𝗼 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘃𝗲𝗹 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗺𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗧𝗿𝗶𝗽 𝗣𝗶𝗻 𝗲𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗖𝗵𝗿𝗼𝗺𝗲. 

Seamlessly integrate Google apps to find lodging, driving directions, car rentals, flights, and curated content nearby your destination. This extension combines efficiency with impact—making every trip a meaningful one.
___________________________________________________________________________

ACTIVATION
𝗔𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗺𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗧𝗿𝗶𝗽 𝗣𝗶𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗶𝗻 𝗷𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗺𝗶𝗻𝘂𝘁𝗲𝘀.

Book lodging nearby any location and also get driving directions, rent a car and buy an air ticket from all of the links on the LAUNCHER that has the Smart Meets Heart icon. 

1. Chrome Browser search
2. Google Calendar entry for a meeting
3. Google Contact manager
4. Google Maps
5. Events.com Discover™ search
6. LinkedIn™

WHY CHOOSE SMART TRIP PIN?
𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝘁𝘂𝗻𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗜𝗺𝗮𝗴𝗲𝘀. 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝘆 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗨𝗹𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝘃𝗲𝗹 𝗧𝗼𝗼𝗹.

Experience breathtaking, inspirational visuals with every new tab, powered by our partnership with Unsplash™. 

Don’t love an image? Simply refresh your screen to see another.

SAVE TIME AND MAKE A DIFFERENCE
𝗣𝗹𝗮𝗻 𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗽𝘀 𝗲𝗳𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗹𝘆 𝘄𝗵𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗴𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗯𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝘁𝗼 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗺𝘂𝗻𝗶𝘁𝘆. 

Every trip booked through our extension generates donations for impactful causes and once you book 10 hotel nights, you get to direct that giving to your charity of choice AND you can earn a royalty on every booking.

KEY FEATURES
Integrated Trip Planning

Use the Smart Trip Pin to book lodging, navigate driving directions, rent cars, or purchase flights directly from your favorite Google tools, including:

● Chrome Search
Highlight text or right-click an address to find nearby lodging instantly.

● Google Calendar 
Automatically do one click search for lodging nearby your meeting or event, populating travel searches based on meeting details.

● Google Contacts
Search accommodations near a contact’s location in just one click.

● Google Maps
Book nearby stays with ease.

● Events.com Discover™
Explore event-driven travel opportunities.

● LinkedIn™
Plan travel based on professional engagements.

POWERFUL SEARCH FUNCTIONALITY
The “Find Lodging Nearby” tool auto-populates searches based on place names, addresses, or keywords.  Simply highlight or right-click to refine your results for unmatched convenience.

VIP TRAVEL PROGRAM WITH COMPREHENSIVE RESULTS
𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘂𝗽𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗱𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗻𝘁 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗻 𝗴𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗸𝘀—𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗮𝗹 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝟰-𝟲 𝗻𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘀 𝗽𝗲𝗿 𝗺𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗵 𝗼𝗿 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲. 𝗖𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗶𝘇𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗮𝗰𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗻𝘁 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗳𝗶𝗹𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘀 𝘁𝗼 𝘀𝘂𝗶𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗳𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲𝘀.

Access millions of options—from hotels to vacation rentals, private homes, and villas. and enjoy our 110% Best Rate Guarantee on all bookings.

EXCLUSIVE BENEFITS DURING BETA TEST
𝗕𝗲𝘁𝗮 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝗸𝘀
𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗾𝘂𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝘂𝗻𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗸 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗶𝘂𝗺 𝗯𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗳𝗶𝘁𝘀 𝘀𝘂𝗰𝗵 𝗮𝘀 𝗱𝗲𝗲𝗽 𝗹𝗼𝗱𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗱𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗽𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝘀𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁.

The first 100 beta testers receive:
● $1 per booking during the beta period.
● Eligibility to choose your favorite charity for donation.
● Early access to our VIP Travel Program offering significant discounts and exclusive tools.

___________________________________________________________________________

HOW IT WORKS
1. Activate the Extension: Install the Smart Trip Pin for Chrome.
2. Plan with Ease: Use Google apps to search, book, and manage your trips.
3. Give Back: Each booking contributes to charitable donations through TravelingToGive™.

Example Use Cases:

● Schedule a meeting in Google Calendar, and Smart Trip Pin suggests nearby lodging.
● Highlight an address on any website to instantly find accommodations.
● Search for properties near an event location on Events.com Discover™.
Transparent and Competitive Pricing
● Free to Use: Access the Smart Trip Pin extension at no cost.

UPGRADES AVAILABLE
𝗙𝗼𝗿 𝗳𝗿𝗲𝗾𝘂𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀, 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗶𝘂𝗺 𝗼𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝘂𝗻𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗸 𝗮𝗱𝗱𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗯𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗳𝗶𝘁𝘀, 𝗶𝗻𝗰𝗹𝘂𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴:

○ Advanced booking tools for events
○ Higher donation thresholds and booking bonuses
○ Exclusive discounts via the VIP Travel Program.

GETTING STARTED

1. Install the Extension: Download Smart Trip Pin.
2. Join the Beta Program: Click on the Smart Meets Heart icon on your toolbar and register to earn $1 per booking and choose your favorite charity.
3. Track Your Progress: Use the Smart Tool Portal to monitor bookings, donations, and discover upgrade opportunities.

WHY WAIT?
Take the first step towards smarter travel today

https://portal.solutionz.com/sign-up?r=SSIua5-3

Sign up now to secure your spot in the beta test and start earning rewards while making a difference.
